channel.title: How to add 120 dung requirment to equip comp cape
channel.description: I currently coded Dung into my 718/737 server, but the comp cape can be equipible without 120 dung. How do i fix this? Thanks =]

item.title: How to add 120 dung requirment to equip comp cape
item.dc:creator: @nickcheese nickcheese
item.description:
@nickcheese wrote:

Found it, it says public static boolean canWear(Item item, Player player) { if(player.getRights() == 2) return true; if(player.getRights() == 7) return true; if((item.getId() == 20769 || item.getId() == 20771)) { if(!player.isCompletedFightKiln()) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You need to complete the fight kiln minigame at least once to use this cape."); return true; } if (!player.isKilledQueenBlackDragon()) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You need to have killed the Queen Black Dragon atleast once to use this cape."); return true; }

I temp. , took out kiln till I code, so that requirement is not there, how do i add the lvl one?

Read full topic
item.source: How to add 120 dung requirment to equip comp cape

item.title: How to add 120 dung requirment to equip comp cape
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Not familiar with the revision, so no.
My best guess is itemConstants.java.
Just search up the ID of the completionist cape and you should find it easily enough.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add 120 dung requirment to equip comp cape
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Find where it checks your level prerequisites for the Completionist cape, and add 120 dungeoneering to it.
